TopicTitle: How to use mechjeb in a way as to avoid cheating.

Articles.Content:
To me, mechjeb is:

1. A tutor.

2. Something used to prove that i engineered a good rocket.

3. Something used to pull of extremely complicated tasked that even Scott himself will find difficult.
How many of these are you going to post?
MechJeb threads get banned for a reason..
Ya know, most people would take a hint after the first one got locked...

Please don't post these. The first was locked for a reason. Besides, even if it were allowed, it's in the wrong section.

Locked.
